#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
const int SIZE = 1e5+1;
pair<int,int> PII[SIZE];
map<int,int> mtp;
map<int,int> upper;
void solve(int n){
    int half=(n/2)+(n&1);
    int mini=INT_MAX;
    bool ok=false;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(mtp[PII[i].first]>=half){
                    ok=true;
            mini=min(mini,max(0,half-upper[PII[i].first]));
            }
            if(mtp[PII[i].second]>=half){
                    ok=true;
            mini=min(mini,max(0,half-upper[PII[i].second]));
    }
    }
    if(!ok){
            printf("Impossible\n");
    return;
    }
    printf("%d\n",mini);


}
int main()
{
    int tt;
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            scanf("%d",&PII[i].first);
            scanf("%d",&PII[i].second);
    ++mtp[PII[i].first];
    if(PII[i].first!=PII[i].second)
        ++mtp[PII[i].second];
        ++upper[PII[i].first];
    }
    solve(n);
    mtp.clear();
    return 0;
}
